featured.text: Hseu Fang-yi, a young Taiwanese dancer, recently _____ at Lincoln Center in New York and won a great deal of praise.

definition.zh_def: 無法識別的詞彙，可能是拼寫錯誤或不常見的詞。
definition.en_def: An unrecognized term, possibly a misspelling or an uncommon word.
definition.example: The word 'hseu' does not appear to have a standard meaning in English.
